CRITEO delivers personalised performance marketing at an extensive scale. Measuring return on post-click sales, making ROI transparent and easy to measure. Criteo has 2,800+ employees in 30+ offices across the Americas and EMEA, serves over 14000 advertisers worldwide and maintains direct relationships with over 18,000 publishers. 

Our technology takes machine  learning based approaches to determining what user we show an ad to, when, and for what products. Billions of unique adverts are created and displayed at lightning fast speeds.

- 8 DCs on 3 continents, > 20000 servers, a few tens of Petabytes on our HPC cluster

- 6 ms avg to select optimal campaign
- 10 ms to find best product in catalogue of 100M 
- 120B ad calls per day
- 20TB of new data stored daily 
- 50PB of raw storage 

Criteo R&D develops the infrastructure and tools that allow us to manage these ever increasing volumes of data. More advertisers supplying more catalogs of products, more publishers and more user variables mean that we are working in a very fast-paced release cycle and are adding new capabilities weekly and even daily.
